innerAbility: Boss Damage +10% (If not chosen as 1st line)
Meso Obtained +10% (If not chosen as 1st line)

info: Beast Tamer character creation only occurs for a limited time. Beast Tamer character creations are normally announced for major updates and can happen several times a year
Beast Tamer is only available in Japan, China, Global, and Taiwan versions of MapleStory

build:
Please visit the Beast Tamer Discord for in-depth information on how to allocate your SP and explanations to the builds below

Press the images below to expand them on a different page

Example Hawk Build

Example Leopard Build
An example skill build that utilizes . For more example builds, please check out the Beast Tamer Discord
details: Beast Tamer unlocks new skills as you reach higher levels and allocate enough SP into that tree
Beast Tamer continues to gain Skill Points (SP) until Lv. 250
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Furious Strikes - Reinforce, Extra Strike and Boss Rush
  • Formation Attack - Reinforce and Spread

If investing in Leopard Mode instead of Hawk Mode, the following can be used instead

  • Three-Point Pounce - Reinforce and Spread

nodeInfo.recommended:
Primary Trio
Secondary Trio
[ OR ]
Leopard Mobbing Trio
  • Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first and so on
    • For convenience while training, and can also be on the same Boost Node
  • is useful for certain bossing situations and is useful for training with Bear Form
  • Leopard Mobbing Trio can be used if you use Leopard Form for training
    • 4 (or 6) Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)
      • Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to the members of the Beast Tamer Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Hyper Passive Build + Boost Nodes Build + Inner Ability + Skill Build Path

extraContent.title: Fort, Lai, Eka, and Arby
extraContent.content:
Beast Tamers do not have 1st, 2nd, 3rd, and 4th Job Advancements. Instead they 4 different animal modes with their own separate skill trees. The skills can only be used while in the chosen mode. There is a Bear Mode, Leopard Mode, Hawk Mode, and Cat Mode. Bear Mode and Leopard Mode is available at Lv. 10. However, Hawk Mode is unlocked at Lv. 30 and Cat Mode is unlocked at Lv. 50

New skills are unlocked at certain levels and after allocating a set amount of Skill Points (SP) into that animal skill tree. However, you will not be able to max all your skills as there is not enough SP. Additionally, any skill effects such as passives and actives are only granted while in that particular animal mode

Click this button in the Skill UI to show the expanded Skill Tree

primary.name: Guardian Leap
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, jumps further
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

primary.name: Critter Select
primary.shortDesc: Use your direction keys to select an animal mode.
primary.desc: Allows you to change between each animal mode

primary.name: Homeward Bound
primary.shortDesc: Returns to the Aboren Ferry when used.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Beast Scepter Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Scepter Mastery: +70%, Magic ATT: +50
details: Skill Level gradually increases as your character levels up

primary.name: Growth Spurt
primary.shortDesc: INT: +60 , LUK: +30, Critical Rate: +16%, Max HP: +40%, Max MP: +16%, Boss Damage: +11%, Magic ATT: +5%, DEF: +2000, All Abnormal Status and Elemental Resistance: +40%, Damage taken when hit by enemies: -40%, Knockback Resistance: +100%.
details: Skill Level gradually increases as your character levels up

primary.name: Maple Guardian
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, All Stats: +15%, Duration: 900 sec

primary.name: Beastly Resolve
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

primary.name: Paw Swipe
primary.shortDesc: First 3 Hits: Damage: 420%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Max Hits: 1
primary.desc: Swipes forward 3 times consecutively
details: You can move and jump while casting

primary.name: Majestic Trumpet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Damage: 210%, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Duration: 15 sec.
primary.desc: Releases a lethal gas that leaves a lingering burning field
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Well Fed
primary.shortDesc: Passive Effect: Max HP: +50%, INT: +50

primary.name: Dumb Luck
primary.shortDesc: Knockback Resistance: +95%, Defense: +200, Damage taken when hit by enemies: -30%.

primary.name: Deep Breath
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Damage: 450%, Max Enemies Hit: 8.
primary.desc: Inhales pulling in enemies in front of you

primary.name: Fort Follow-Up
primary.shortDesc: Additional Damage: 275%, Number of Attacks: 3
primary.desc: Every 4th attack, you deal an additional attack

primary.name: Defense Ignorance
primary.shortDesc: Passive Effect: Enemy DEF Ignored: 30%, Attack Speed: +2

primary.name: Furious Strikes
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Damage: 450%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 8\nExtra Paw Swipe Damage: +100%. While channeling this skill, damage taken from enemy attacks (including attacks that deal a fixed percent of damage) are reduced by 20%.
primary.desc: Continuously slam hammers in front of you
details: Activates when pressing Attack Key 4 times in a row
To keep Furious Strikes going, you can hold onto or mash the Attack Key
While casting, increases %Damage Reduction including %Max HP attacks
You can move and jump while casting

primary.name: Bear Strength
primary.shortDesc: Passive Effect: Critical Rate: +60%, Critical Damage: +40%, Magic ATT: +15

primary.name: Really Deep Breath
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Damage: 670%, Max Enemies Hit: 10
primary.desc: Inhales pulling in enemies on both sides of you
details: Skill is separate from

primary.name: Lil Fort
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 46\n- Bear Damage: 475%, Number of Attacks: 4\n- Bear Duration: 60 sec.
primary.desc: Summons Lil Fort to attack at a fixed location

primary.name: Fort the Brave
primary.shortDesc: Passive Effect: Magic ATT: +10%

primary.name: Bear Assault
primary.shortDesc: Active Effect - MP Cost: 62, Damage: +35%, Critical Damage: +10%, Final Damage: +20%\nPassive Effects - Max HP: +20%, Max MP: +20%, DEF: +100%, Ignore Enemy DEF: +20%\nReduce the maximum number of monsters that can be attacked, with all of the character's attack skills, to 1/3 (aside from some minions). Minimum number of monsters that can be attacked for multi-target skills: 1

primary.name: Fishy Slap
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 330%,\nNumber of Attacks: 5, Skill Duration: 13 sec, Cooldown: 30 sec.
primary.desc: Swings a giant fish that damages nearby enemies

primary.name: Bear Reborn
primary.shortDesc: Resurrection Cooldown: 1800 sec, Resurrection Invincibility: 10 sec
primary.desc: When hit by a fatal attack, you will be revived
details: When revive activates, knock back and damage nearby enemies
You are briefly invincible after reviving

primary.name: Billowing Trumpet
primary.shortDesc: Magic ATT: +30, Majestic Trumpet Damage over Time: +140%.
details: Increases %Damage of attack
Additionally grants flat Magic Attack

primary.name: Table Flip
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Damage: 560%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 10\nCooldown: 15 sec
primary.desc: Flips a table in front of you damaging nearby enemies

primary.name: Leopard's Paw
primary.shortDesc: Damage: 200% (first two hits), Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 2.
primary.desc: Swipes forward 2 times

primary.name: Thunder Dash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Damage: 230%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Cooldown: 3 sec
primary.desc: Swipes and dashes forward
details:
Can be linked with:
  • Leopard's Paw
  • Leopard's Pounce
  • Leopard's Roar
  • Macho Slam
  • Three-Point Pounce

primary.name: Leopard Hide
primary.shortDesc: Trigger Chance: 40%, Restores 8% of the finishing blow's damage dealt as HP
details: Maximum of 10% Max HP can be restored per attack

primary.name: Leopard's Pounce
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 0, Damage: 280%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 8
primary.desc: Pounces forward
details:
Automatically activated when pressing Attack Key 3 times in a row
  • Can also be activated manually by pressing the Skill Key after the 2nd attack

primary.name: Rippling Feline Muscles
primary.shortDesc: Magic ATT: +35, INT: +35, Speed: +35, Jump: +6

primary.name: Macho Dance
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Damage: 240%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 8
primary.desc: Swipes up into the air launching yourself up

primary.name: Macho Slam
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Damage: 300%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 8
primary.desc: Pounces back down towards the ground
details: Can only be used in the air

primary.name: Bro Attack
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Summon Chance: 30%, Duration: 180 sec., Damage: 300%, Mini Snow Leopard Duration: 40 sec., Number of Attacks: 4, Max number of Mini Snow Leopards: 20.
primary.desc: While active, grants a chance for your attacks to summon a baby Snow Leopard to attack alongside you

primary.name: Leopard's Roar
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 0, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 4\nLeopard's Paw and Leopard's Pounce Damage: +20%, Max Enemies Hit: +3
primary.desc: Roars forward sending out a damaging shockwave
details: Automatically activated when pressing Attack Key after
Also permanently increases %Damage and max number of enemies hit for and
Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters

primary.name: Thunder Trail
primary.shortDesc: Afterimage: Damage: 160%, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Duration: 4 sec., Number of Attacks: 3
primary.desc: Leaves a damaging burning field after using

primary.name: Macho Incarnate
primary.shortDesc: Damage: 850%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Duration: 4 sec., Number of Attacks: 1, Chance to Stun: 100%\nNumber of mobs attacked with Macho Dance, Macho Slam: +3, Damage: +20%
primary.desc: Releases a mighty roar that has a chance to stun enemies after using
details: [Passive]: Increases %Damage and max number of enemies hit for and

primary.name: Three-Point Pounce
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 130, Damage: 615%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Cooldown: 2 sec
primary.desc: Pounces around 3 times while slashing at enemies

primary.name: Advanced Thunder Dash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 112, Damage: 400%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Cooldown: 2 sec
details: Increases %Damage and dash distance
Reduces cooldown

primary.name: Deadly Fangs
primary.shortDesc: Magic ATT: +30, Final Damage: +20%

primary.name: Lethal Lai
primary.shortDesc: Leopard's Paw, Leopard's Pounce, Leopard's Roar, Macho Dance, Macho Slam and Thunder Dash Damage: +50%, Max Enemies Hit: +4, Enemy DEF Ignore: +30%, Damage Against Normal Enemies: +25%

primary.name: Leopard Reflexes
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2 level(s), Magic ATT: +6%, Ignore Enemy Defense: 60%

primary.name: Party Time
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Damage: 650%, Number of Attacks: 8, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Cooldown: 15 sec
primary.desc: Unleashes a deadly slash that damages a large area

primary.name: Formation Attack
primary.shortDesc: Damage: 110%, Max Enemies Hit: 3, Number of Attacks: 1. When enemies are hit, reduces Fly's cooldown by 0.5 sec.
primary.desc: While the Attack Key is held, fires out homing birds
details: When the birds hit an enemy, the cooldown of is reduced slightly
You can move while casting

primary.name: Sky Walk
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 13. Jump up to two more times in midair after your initial jump.
primary.desc: Increases the jump distance of and allows you to jump an extra time
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

primary.name: Vertical Draft
primary.shortDesc: Jump: 1650
primary.desc: Launches yourself up into the air
details: Can also be activated by double-tapping the Up Arrow Key while in the air

primary.name: Eka Express
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Portal Duration: 200 sec, Cooldown: 200 sec\nPassive Effects - Critical Damage: +10%
primary.desc: Creates a portal that leads to the nearest town for your party members
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Crit Damage
To use, press the Up Arrow Key

primary.name: Fly
primary.shortDesc: Flight Duration: 30 sec, Cooldown: 60 sec.
primary.desc: Allows you to fly which unlocks additional attacks
details: Press and hold the Jump Key and Up Arrow Key to fly
Press the Jump Key and Down Arrow Key to stop flying

primary.name: Hawk Flock
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 25, Duration: 180 sec, Speed: +30, Jump: +15\nPassive Effects - Max Movement Speed: +15

primary.name: Max Mobility
primary.shortDesc: Magic ATT: +30, Attack Speed: +-2 level(s), Ignore Enemy Defense: 30%

primary.name: Defensive Formation
primary.shortDesc: Damage (Eka's friends): 150%, Max Hits: 2
primary.desc: While in , birds periodically spawn and attack nearby enemies

primary.name: Eka Glider
primary.shortDesc: Glide: Hold Skill Key
primary.desc: While in the air, holding the Skill Key will allow you to glide

primary.name: Feather Cloak
primary.shortDesc: Jump: +4, Critical Rate: +15%

primary.name: Regroup
primary.shortDesc: Summons party members. MP Cost: 60, Cooldown: 600 sec\nPassive Effects - Ignore Enemy Defense: 20%
primary.desc: Summons any party members on the same channel to your location
details: [Passive]: Increases %Ignore DEF
Characters have to be above Lv. 9

primary.name: Raptor Talons
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Duration: 180 sec, Magic ATT: +60\nPassive Effects: Bleed Chance: 100%, Bleed Damage: 340% per sec, Bleed Duration: 6 sec\nCooldown: 0 sec
primary.desc: Grants flat Magic Attack and causes your attacks to apply a damaging bleeding debuff

primary.name: Baby Bombers
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 80, Damage: 525%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 8\nCooldown: 3 sec
primary.desc: While in , commands birds to slash around you, damaging nearby enemies

primary.name: Bird's-Eye View
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Duration: 450 sec, Critical Rate: +15%, Defense: +900

primary.name: Veteran Formation
primary.shortDesc: Formation Attack, Defensive Formation, and Baby Bombers Damage: +150%, Formation Attack Count: +3

primary.name: Razor Beak
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 22, Weapon ATT: +30, Magic ATT: +30, Duration: 180 sec

primary.name: Feather Boots
primary.shortDesc: Movement Speed: +45, Critical Damage: +15%

primary.name: Tornado Flight
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 42, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 800%. Steer by holding the skill key and pressing Left, Right, Up, and Down. Max Range: 600, Cooldown: 25
primary.desc: While held during , creates a tornado that damages nearby enemies

primary.name: Friend Launcher
primary.shortDesc: Damage: 200%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 4. On the 4th attack, delivers a final blow striking 8 enemies once and dealing 400% damage.
primary.desc: Launches an animal forward that damages enemies it hits

primary.name: Cat Wit
primary.shortDesc: Passive Effect - INT: +100

primary.name: Kitty Battle Squad
primary.shortDesc: Passive Effects: ATT/Magic ATT: +35

primary.name: Kitty Treats
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +625, Max MP: +625

primary.name: Purr-Powered
primary.shortDesc: Passive Effect - Stance Chance: +30%, HP Recovery: 100 per 4 seconds, MP Recovery: 100 per 4 seconds

primary.name: Sticky Paws
primary.shortDesc: Passive Effect - Party Item Drop Chance: +20%

primary.name: Meow Heal
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 46, Max Number: 6, Recovered: 20%
primary.desc: Throws a yarn that heals any party members it hits

primary.name: Cat's Claws
primary.shortDesc: Passive Effects: Critical Rate: +30%, Critical Damage: +10%

primary.name: Meow Cure
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Chance to nullify magic effects and remove abnormal status: 100%, Cooldown: 5 sec
primary.desc: Cures party members of Abnormal Statuses

primary.name: Purr Zone
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: MP 115, Max Targets Affected: 8, Damage: 1000%, Friends Healed: 550, Duration: 22 sec, Cooldown: 15 sec
primary.desc: Creates a zone that heals party members and damages enemies within it

primary.name: Meow Card
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 0,
Red Card - Damage: +40%
Blue Card - DEF: +200, Max HP/MP: +25%
Yellow Card - Attack Speed: +-2, Speed: +20
Duration: 180 sec, Cooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Provides a random buff based on a card chosen
details: [Red Card]: Increases %Damage
[Blue Card]: Increases %Max HP/MP and grants flat DEF
[Green Card]: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages) and Movement Speed

primary.name: Friend Launcher - Enhance
primary.shortDesc: Friend Launcher Damage: +100%
details: Increases %Damage of attack

primary.name: Mouser's Insight
primary.shortDesc: DEF Ignored: 20%

primary.name: Fire Kitty!
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 46, Damage: 800%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Enemy DEF: -40%, Cooldown: 3 sec
primary.desc: Launches a kitty forward that debuffs enemies hit
details:
[Debuff]: Enemy has reduced %DEF
  • Reduction to %DEF can be considered as %Ignore DEF

primary.name: Meow Revive
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 75, Revives KO'd party member within range, Cooldown: 750 sec
primary.desc: Revives all KO'd party members within range
details: Still consumes a Death Count for bosses even if revived but buffs are kept

primary.name: Meow Gold Card
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 75, Passive Effect: Gold Card Chance: 100%
primary.desc: Grants a chance to draw the Gold Card when using that provides the effects of all 3 cards

primary.name: Friends of Arby
primary.shortDesc: Passive Effect: Party EXP: +30%
details: When stacked with Holy Symbol, only the highest EXP bonus will take effect

primary.name: Cat's Cradle Blitzkrieg
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Cat's Cradle Blitzkreig Duration: 10 sec., Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1000%, Number of Attacks: 1. Final Damage +20%, on enemies hit by Cat's Cradle, for 20 sec.
primary.desc: Creates a zone where enemies within are damaged and applied a debuff
details: [Debuff]: Enemies take increased %Final Damage

hyperActive.name: Team Roar
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Invincibility Duration: 15 sec, Damage Boost: +30%\nCooldown: 180 sec
hyperActive.desc: While active, grants invincibility to yourself and increases %Damage for your party

hyperActive.name: Group Bear Blaster
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500, Damage: 540%, Number of Attacks: 15, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Cooldown: 90 sec, Invincible while casting
hyperActive.desc: Launches Fort at enemies around you
details: You are invincible while casting

hyperActive.name: All Together! Critter Crossing!
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 60, applies all of the passive and buff skills with a few exceptions, regardless of the mode.\nHowever, only skills with SP invested will be maintained, and buffs will disappear regardless of the remaining duration when this buff ends.\nCooldown: 180 sec
hyperActive.desc: While active, applies all your passive and buff effects, regardless of the mode you are in
details: Only passives and buffs you have allocated Skill Points (SP) into are affected

fifthMain.name: Champ Charge
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000
Bear - picks up a big drum to attack 10 enemies 20 times, dealing 1200% damage.
Snow Leopard - uses powerful claws to attack 12 enemies 20 times, dealing 1000% damage. Thunder Trail effect applies.
Hawk - shoots feathers in a wide arc to attack 15 enemies 15 times, dealing 900% damage.
Cat - periodically attacks 10 enemies 5 times, dealing 600% damage. Creates a tree for 10 sec., which decreases damage taken by allies within range by 40%.
Cooldown: 30 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Based on your current animal mode, release a powerful attack and grants a buff for that mode
details: [Bear]: Increases %Damage Reduction including %Max HP attacks
[Hawk]: Increases %Crit Damage
[Snow Leopard]: effect applies to the attack
[Cat]: Creates a tree that increases %Damage Reduction including %Max HP attacks to party members within range

fifthMain.name: Cub Cavalry
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Summon Duration: 10 sec. Summons between 4 and at most 8 groups of critter cubs, depending on the number of enemies within range.
Cubs periodically attack 3 times dealing 600% damage.
When time runs out the cubs attack, dealing 1500% damage to as many as 8 enemies 8 times
Cooldown: 30 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summons a group of critters that travel around while damaging enemies in its path
details: Pressing the Down Arrow Key and Skill Key together will summon the critters at your position in the direction you are facing
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Aerial Relief
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1500, periodically attacks 34 times, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 630%, Number of Attacks: 12\nRecovers 1250 HP for you and nearby allies and ignores abnormal status.\nCooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Your animal friends get on an airplane and launches forward
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect
Using the skill will restore some HP and cure Abnormal Statuses to nearby party members

fifthMain.name: The Greatest Show on Maple World is Coming!
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 55 sec. Forms an area of effect that attacks up to 5 enemies for 1000% damage, 10 time(s), every 4 sec. If the mode changes during buff duration, it activates a tag attack that attacks up to 10 enemies, for 1275% damage, 12 time(s). Tag Attack Cooldown: 5 sec\nCooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Your animal friends surround you, periodically damaging nearby enemies
details: While active, changing animal modes will activate a special attack
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

meta: Beast Tamer is an INT mage class part of its own Beast Tamer class group. What is special about Beast Tamers is that they do not have regular 1st, 2nd, 3rd, and 4th Job Advancements. Instead they 4 different animal stances with their own separate skill trees. The skills can only be used while in that specified stance. There is a Bear stance, Leopard stance, Hawk stance, and Cat stance
